code: /** @format */import React from"react";import{useSelector}from"react-redux";import{selectIsSignIn,selectResetPassword}from"../../slices/authenticate.slice";import{Card,Container,Row,Col,Image}from"react-bootstrap";import SignIn from"../sign-in/sign-in.component";import SignUp from"../sign-up/sign-up.component";import ResetPassword from"../reset-password/reset-password.component";import image from"../../assets/breakfast.svg";import{TitleContainer}from"./authenticate.styles";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Authenticate=function Authenticate(){var isSignIn=useSelector(selectIsSignIn);var resetPassword=useSelector(selectResetPassword);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{style:{marginTop:"150px"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Row,{className:"justify-content-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{style:{marginBottom:"2rem",position:"relative",textAlign:"center"},xs:8,sm:8,md:6,lg:5,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Image,{src:image})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{class:"mt-1",xs:12,sm:10,md:8,lg:{span:5,offset:1},children:!isSignIn?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SignUp,{}):!resetPassword?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SignIn,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ResetPassword,{})})]})});};export default Authenticate;
